main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were reported over Atlanta, Georgia from July 23 to July 27, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing as many as 15 objects by the evening of July 27, 1966., The objects were described as oval to spherical and smaller than a pea., Color descriptions varied from reddish to white with rhythmic changes., FAA employees observed some objects appearing cylindrical with no sound being recorded., Observers noted that the objects could move at high speeds, often changing direction abruptly.
witness description: FAA employees, civilians with experience in aviation
